overview:
Yann Courqueux is the CMO of Netgem. He joined Netgem after more than 15 years of international, sales, marketing and management experience within the Thomson Group. Most recently, Yann has been involved in strategic planning for Thomsonâ€™s IPTV and MobileTV operations while also managing partnership development, marketing and responses to international tenders. One of his key missions was to pre-package solutions for innovative and fast-to-market deployments.

Yann holds a Master of Science in Image Communication, a German Diplomarbeit in Telecommunications and an MBA from INSEAD.
